content: I get to pick? My ears say today's luck is on the left. Ahem, then I'll go with left!

content: I get to pick? Well, we have a saying in the grasslands: "Follow the one on the right, and success will come in sight!" So, the right it is!
info: NPC特色交互-萨飞里-赌石_萨飞里

content: {A挑衅坏笑}Opening a stone and discovering its secrets inside... It's as wild as setting foot on an unknown planet for the first time! Close your eyes and pick one — let's test your luck!
info: NPC特色交互-萨飞里-赌石_萨飞里

content: Right? Did your ears tell you that? Are you sure? Alright, let's take a look!
info: NPC特色交互-萨飞里-赌石_萨飞里
NPC特色交互-萨飞里-赌石_萨飞里

content: {A挑衅坏笑}Kula bata! Check out these two stones — the left one wards off bad luck, the right one brings good fortune. Come on, pick one!
info: NPC特色交互-萨飞里-赌石_萨飞里

content: {A虎啸}<style=SizeBig>Haaah!</style> It's [article_or_num:1,{奖励石}] <style=Highlight>[quant_noun:1,{奖励石}]</style>! Congrats, luck is smiling upon you, kula bata!
info: NPC特色交互-萨飞里-赌石_萨飞里

content: Left? I always go left at a fork too. Guess we're on the same wavelength! So it's settled then? Okay, let's see what you got!
info: NPC特色交互-萨飞里-赌石_萨飞里

content: Kula bata. {A点头}It's [article_or_num:1,{奖励石}] <style=Highlight>[quant_noun:1,{奖励石}]</style>! Nice. Bye bye, bad luck — today's looking bright!
